platform_numbers.description: Filter by platform number at stop

direction_id.description: Filter by identifier of direction of travel; values returned by Directions API - /v3/directions/route/{route_id}

gtfs.description: Indicates that stop_id parameter will accept "GTFS stop_id" data

date_utc.description: Filter by the date and time of the request (ISO 8601 UTC format) (default = current date and time)

include_cancelled.description: Indicates if cancelled services (if they exist) are returned (default = false) - metropolitan train only

look_backwards.description: Indicates if filtering runs (and their departures) to those that arrive at destination before date_utc (default = false). Requires max_results > 0.

expand.description:
List of objects to be returned in full (i.e. expanded) - options include: All, Stop, Route, Run, Direction, Disruption, VehiclePosition, VehicleDescriptor or None.
Run must be expanded to receive VehiclePosition and VehicleDescriptor information.

include_geopath.description: Indicates if the route geopath should be returned

stops.description: A train station, tram stop, bus stop, regional coach stop or Night Bus stop

routes.description: Train lines, tram routes, bus routes, regional coach routes, Night Bus routes

disruptions.description: Disruption information applicable to relevant routes or stops

run_id.description: Numeric trip/service run identifier. Defaults to -1 when run identifier is Alphanumeric

scheduled_departure_utc.description: Scheduled (i.e. timetabled) departure time and date in ISO 8601 UTC format

estimated_departure_utc.description: Real-time estimate of departure time and date in ISO 8601 UTC format

at_platform.description: Indicates if the metropolitan train service is at the platform at the time of query; returns false for other modes

platform_number.description: Platform number at stop (metropolitan train only; returns null for other modes)

flags.description: Flag indicating special condition for run (e.g. RR Reservations Required, GC Guaranteed Connection, DOO Drop Off Only, PUO Pick Up Only, MO Mondays only, TU Tuesdays only, WE Wednesdays only, TH Thursdays only, FR Fridays only, SS School days only; ignore E flag)

departure_sequence.description: Chronological sequence for the departures in a run. Order ascendingly by this field to get chronological order (earliest first) of departures with the same run_ref. NOTE, this field is not always N+1 or N-1 of the previous or following departure. e.g 100, 200, 250, 300 instead of 1, 2, 3, 4

stop_distance.description: Distance of stop from input location (in metres); returns 0 if no location is input

stop_latitude.description: Geographic coordinate of latitude at stop

stop_longitude.description: Geographic coordinate of longitude at stop

stop_sequence.description: Sequence of the stop on the route/run; return 0 when route_id or run_id not specified. Order ascendingly by this field (when non zero) to get physical order (earliest first) of stops on the route_id/run_id.

run_id.description: Numeric trip/service run identifier. Defaults to -1 when run identifier is Alphanumeric

final_stop_id.description: stop_id of final stop of run

status.description: Status of metropolitan train run; returns "scheduled" for other modes

run_sequence.description: Chronological sequence of the trip/service run on the route in direction. Order ascendingly by this field to get chronological order (earliest first) of runs with the same route_id and direction_id.

express_stop_count.description: The number of remaining skipped/express stations for the run/service from a stop

vehicle_position.description: Position of the trip/service run. Available for some Bus, Nightrider and Train runs. May be null.

vehicle_descriptor.description: Descriptor of the trip/service run. Only available for some runs. May be null.

url.description: URL of relevant article on PTV website

published_on.description: Date and time disruption information is published on PTV website, in ISO 8601 UTC format

last_updated.description: Date and time disruption information was last updated by PTV, in ISO 8601 UTC format

from_date.description: Date and time at which disruption begins, in ISO 8601 UTC format

to_date.description: Date and time at which disruption ends, in ISO 8601 UTC format (returns null if unknown)

routes.description: Route relevant to a disruption (if applicable)

stops.description: Stop relevant to a disruption (if applicable)

latitude.description:
Geographic coordinate of latitude of the vehicle when known. May be null.
Only available for some bus runs.

longitude.description:
Geographic coordinate of longitude of the vehicle when known. 
Only available for some bus runs.

easting.description: CIS - Metro Train Vehicle Location Easting coordinate

northing.description: CIS - Metro Train Vehicle Location Northing coordinate

direction.description: CIS - Metro Train Vehicle Location Direction

bearing.description:
Compass bearing of the vehicle when known, clockwise from True North, i.e., 0 is North and 90 is East. May be null.
Only available for some bus runs.

datetime_utc.description: Date and time that the vehicle position data was supplied.

expiry_time.description: CIS - Metro Train Vehicle Location data expiry time

operator.description:
Operator name of the vehicle such as "Metro Trains Melbourne", "Yarra Trams", "Ventura Bus Line", "CDC" or "Sita Bus Lines" . May be null/empty.
Only available for train, tram, v/line and some bus runs.

id.description: Operator identifier of the vehicle such as "26094". May be null/empty. Only available for some tram and bus runs.

low_floor.description: Indicator if vehicle has a low floor. May be null. Only available for some tram runs.

air_conditioned.description: Indicator if vehicle is air conditioned. May be null. Only available for some tram runs.

description.description:
Vehicle description such as "6 Car Comeng", "6 Car Xtrapolis", "3 Car Comeng", "6 Car Siemens", "3 Car Siemens". May be null/empty.
Only available for some metropolitan train runs.

length.description: The length of the vehicle. Applies to CIS - Metro Trains

route_number.description: Route number presented to public (i.e. not route_id)

direction.description: Direction of travel relevant to a disruption (if applicable)

route_direction_id.description: Route and direction of travel combination identifier

service_time.description: Time of service to which disruption applies, in 24 hour clock format (HH:MM:SS) AEDT/AEST; returns null if disruption applies to multiple (or no) services

direction_id.description: Filter by identifier of direction of travel; values returned by Directions API - /v3/directions/route/{route_id}

gtfs.description: Indicates that stop_id parameter will accept "GTFS stop_id" data

date_utc.description: Filter by the date and time of the request (ISO 8601 UTC format) (default = current date and time)

include_cancelled.description: Indicates if cancelled services (if they exist) are returned (default = false) - metropolitan train only

look_backwards.description: Indicates if filtering runs (and their departures) to those that arrive at destination before date_utc (default = false). Requires max_results > 0.

expand.description:
List of objects to be returned in full (i.e. expanded) - options include: All, Stop, Route, Run, Direction, Disruption, VehiclePosition, VehicleDescriptor or None.
Run must be expanded to receive VehiclePosition and VehicleDescriptor information.

include_geopath.description: Indicates if the route geopath should be returned

scheduled_timetables.description:
When set to true, all timetable information returned by Chronos will be sourced from the scheduled timetables,
while when set to false (default state), the operational timetables will be used where available.

date_utc.description: Filter by the date and time of the request (ISO 8601 UTC format) (default = current date and time)

include_cancelled.description: Indicates if cancelled services (if they exist) are returned (default = false) - metropolitan train only

look_backwards.description: Indicates if filtering runs (and their departures) to those that arrive at destination before date_utc (default = false). Requires max_results > 0.

expand.description:
List of objects to be returned in full (i.e. expanded) - options include: All, Stop, Route, Run, Direction, Disruption, VehiclePosition, VehicleDescriptor or None.
Run must be expanded to receive VehiclePosition and VehicleDescriptor information.

include_geopath.description: Indicates if the route geopath should be returned

date_utc.description: Filter by the date and time of the request (ISO 8601 UTC format) (default = current date and time)

look_backwards.description: Indicates if filtering runs (and their departures) to those that arrive at destination before date_utc (default = false). Requires max_results > 0.

include_cancelled.description: Indicates if cancelled services (if they exist) are returned (default = false) - metropolitan train only

include_geopath.description: Indicates if the route geopath should be returned

expand.description: List objects to be returned in full (i.e. expanded) - options include: all, stop, route, run, direction, disruption, none

route_type.description: Number identifying transport mode; values returned via RouteTypes API

stop_id.description: Identifier of stop; values returned by Stops API

gtfs.description: Indicates that stop_id parameter will accept "GTFS stop_id" data and route_directions[x].route_id parameters will accept route_gtfs_id data

route_directions.description: The route directions to find departures for at this stop.

route_id.description: Identifier of route; values returned by Routes API - v3/routes

direction_id.description: Direction of travel identifier; values returned by Directions API - v3/directions

direction_name.description: Name of direction of travel; values returned by Directions API - v3/directions

responses.description: Contains departures for the requested stop and route(s). It includes details as to the route_direction and whether it is still valid.

stops.description: A train station, tram stop, bus stop, regional coach stop or Night Bus stop

routes.description: Train lines, tram routes, bus routes, regional coach routes, Night Bus routes

disruptions.description: Disruption information applicable to relevant routes or stops

requested_route_direction.description: The route direction that these departures are for. Will be one of the requested route directions

route_direction_status.description:
The status of the route direction (changed | unchanged).
If changed, requests should change the requested_route_direction for the route_direction supplied.

route_direction.description: The route direction found matching the requested_route_direction

stop_latitude.description: Geographic coordinate of latitude at stop

stop_longitude.description: Geographic coordinate of longitude at stop

disruptions.description: Disruption information applicable to relevant routes or stops

general.description: Subset of disruption information applicable to multiple route_types

metro_train.description: Subset of disruption information applicable to metropolitan train

metro_tram.description: Subset of disruption information applicable to metropolitan tram

metro_bus.description: Subset of disruption information applicable to metropolitan bus

regional_train.description: Subset of disruption information applicable to V/Line train

regional_coach.description: Subset of disruption information applicable to V/Line coach

regional_bus.description: Subset of disruption information applicable to regional bus

school_bus.description: Subset of disruption information applicable to school bus

telebus.description: Subset of disruption information applicable to telebus services

night_bus.description: Subset of disruption information applicable to night bus

ferry.description: Subset of disruption information applicable to ferry

interstate_train.description: Subset of disruption information applicable to interstate train

skybus.description: Subset of disruption information applicable to skybus

taxi.description: Subset of disruption information applicable to taxi

disruption.description: Disruption information applicable to relevant routes or stops

ticket_type.description: Indicates the ticket type for the stop (myki, paper or both)

is_free_fare_zone.description: Indicates whether the stop is inside the free fare zone

outlet_name.description: The location name of the outlet

outlet_business.description: The business name of the outlet

outlet_latitude.description: Geographic coordinate of latitude at outlet

outlet_longitude.description: Geographic coordinate of longitude at outlet

outlet_suburb.description: The city/municipality the outlet is in

outlet_notes.description: Any additional notes for the outlet such as 'Buy pre-loaded myki cards only'. May be null/empty.

max_distance.description: Filter by maximum distance (in metres) from location specified via latitude and longitude parameters (default = 300)

outlet_distance.description: Distance of outlet from input location (in metres); returns 0 if no location is input

outlet_name.description: The location name of the outlet

outlet_business.description: The business name of the outlet

outlet_latitude.description: Geographic coordinate of latitude at outlet

outlet_longitude.description: Geographic coordinate of longitude at outlet

outlet_suburb.description: The city/municipality the outlet is in

outlet_notes.description: Any additional notes for the outlet such as 'Buy pre-loaded myki cards only'. May be null/empty.

disruptions.description: Disruption information applicable to relevant routes or stops

stops.description: A train station, tram stop, bus stop, regional coach stop or Night Bus stop

routes.description: Train lines, tram routes, bus routes, regional coach routes, Night Bus routes

skipped_stops.description: The stops to be skipped following the current departure in order.

run_id.description: Numeric trip/service run identifier. Defaults to -1 when run identifier is Alphanumeric

scheduled_departure_utc.description: Scheduled (i.e. timetabled) departure time and date in ISO 8601 UTC format

estimated_departure_utc.description: Real-time estimate of departure time and date in ISO 8601 UTC format

at_platform.description: Indicates if the metropolitan train service is at the platform at the time of query; returns false for other modes

platform_number.description: Platform number at stop (metropolitan train only; returns null for other modes)

flags.description: Flag indicating special condition for run (e.g. RR Reservations Required, GC Guaranteed Connection, DOO Drop Off Only, PUO Pick Up Only, MO Mondays only, TU Tuesdays only, WE Wednesdays only, TH Thursdays only, FR Fridays only, SS School days only; ignore E flag)

departure_sequence.description: Chronological sequence for the departures in a run. Order ascendingly by this field to get chronological order (earliest first) of departures with the same run_ref. NOTE, this field is not always N+1 or N-1 of the previous or following departure. e.g 100, 200, 250, 300 instead of 1, 2, 3, 4

stop_distance.description: Distance of stop from input location (in metres); returns 0 if no location is input

stop_latitude.description: Geographic coordinate of latitude at stop

stop_longitude.description: Geographic coordinate of longitude at stop

stop_sequence.description: Sequence of the stop on the route/run; return 0 when route_id or run_id not specified. Order ascendingly by this field (when non zero) to get physical order (earliest first) of stops on the route_id/run_id.

route.description: Train lines, tram routes, bus routes, regional coach routes, Night Bus routes

route_service_status.description: Service status for the route (indicates disruptions)

route_number.description: Route number presented to public (nb. not route_id)

route_types.description: Filter by route_type; values returned via RouteTypes API (note: stops and routes are ordered by route_types specified)

latitude.description: Filter by geographic coordinate of latitude

longitude.description: Filter by geographic coordinate of longitude

max_distance.description: Filter by maximum distance (in metres) from location specified via latitude and longitude parameters

include_addresses.description: Placeholder for future development; currently unavailable

include_outlets.description: Indicates if outlets will be returned in response (default = true)

match_stop_by_suburb.description: Indicates whether to find stops by suburbs in the search term (default = true)

match_route_by_suburb.description: Indicates whether to find routes by suburbs in the search term (default = true)

match_stop_by_gtfs_stop_id.description: Indicates whether to search for stops according to a metlink stop ID (default = false)

stops.description: Train stations, tram stops, bus stops, regional coach stops or Night Bus stops

routes.description: Train lines, tram routes, bus routes, regional coach routes, Night Bus routes

stop_distance.description: Distance of stop from input location (in metres); returns 0 if no location is input

routes.description: List of routes travelling through the stop

stop_latitude.description: Geographic coordinate of latitude at stop

stop_longitude.description: Geographic coordinate of longitude at stop

stop_sequence.description: Sequence of the stop on the route/run; return 0 when route_id or run_id not specified. Order ascendingly by this field (when non zero) to get physical order (earliest first) of stops on the route_id/run_id.

route_number.description: Route number presented to public (nb. not route_id)

route_service_status.description: Service status for the route (indicates disruptions)

outlet_distance.description: Distance of outlet from input location (in metres); returns 0 if no location is input

outlet_name.description: The location name of the outlet

outlet_business.description: The business name of the outlet

outlet_latitude.description: Geographic coordinate of latitude at outlet

outlet_longitude.description: Geographic coordinate of longitude at outlet

outlet_suburb.description: The city/municipality the outlet is in

outlet_notes.description: Any additional notes for the outlet such as 'Buy pre-loaded myki cards only'. May be null/empty.

date_utc.description: Filter by the date and time of the request (ISO 8601 UTC format) (default = current date and time)

mapping_version.description: DIVA mapping version generated by Chronos during a Parser or RealtimeBusConfig load

direction_ref.description: Siri DirectionRef  (in, out, up, down, clockwise, counterclockwise, Inbound, Outbound)

tracking_supplier_id.description: Authority (Upstream SIRI provider) of a route and direction

mapping_version.description: DIVA mapping version generated by Chronos during a Parser or RealtimeBusConfig load

direction_ref.description: Siri DirectionRef  (in, out, up, down, clockwise, counterclockwise, Inbound, Outbound)

table_name.description: Name of corresponding table in DynamoDB.

parser_mapping_version.description: Diva Mapping Version used to load Parser into DynamoDB

pt_mapping_version.description: Diva Mapping Version used to load PT into DynamoDB

transport_type.description: A.k.a. Transport Mode (e.g. Train, Tram, Bus, V/Line, Nightrider)

applicable_local_date.description: Formated date string of applicable date

exists.description:
True if the named table has been created in DynamoDB (i.e. at least one departure record has been loaded),
or false if there are no records for this date and transport type.

start_time.description: Siri Start Time of the Validity Period

end_time.description: Siri End Time of the Validity Period

subscription_ref.description: Siri Subscription Ref - Unique to a Subscriber Ref

consumer_address.description: Siri Consumer Address - Baseline and Updates will be sent to this address

initial_termination_time.description: Siri Initial Termination Time - Expiry of the subscription

direction_ref.description: Siri DirectionRef  (in, out, up, down, clockwise, counterclockwise, Inbound, Outbound)

subscription_ref.description: Siri Subscription Ref - Unique to a Subscriber Ref

consumer_address.description: Siri Consumer Address - Baseline and Updates will be sent to this address

initial_termination_time.description: Siri Initial Termination Time - Expiry of the subscription

subscription_ref.description:
Siri Subscription Reference(s) - Unique to a Subscriber Ref.
If `null`, then all subscriptions will be terminated for the referenced Subscriber.

stop.description: A metropolitan or V/Line train station

disruptions.description: Disruption information applicable to relevant routes or stops

station_type.description: Type of metropolitan train station (i.e. "Premium", "Host" or "Unstaffed" station); returns null for V/Line train

station_description.description: The definition applicable to the station_type; returns null for V/Line train

stop_amenities.description: Amenity and facility details at the stop

stop_accessibility.description: Facilities relating to the accessibility of the stop

toilet.description: Indicates if there is a public toilet at or near the stop

taxi_rank.description: Indicates if there is a taxi rank at or near the stop

car_parking.description: The number of free car parking spots at the stop

cctv.description: Indicates if there are CCTV (i.e. closed circuit television) cameras at the stop

lighting.description: Indicates if there is lighting at the stop

platform_number.description: Indicates the platform number for xivic information (Platform 0 indicates general stop facilities)

audio_customer_information.description: Indicates if there is at least one audio customer information at the stop/platform

escalator.description: Indicates if there is at least one accessible escalator at the stop/platform that complies with the Disability Standards for Accessible Public Transport under the Disability Discrimination Act (1992)

hearing_loop.description: Indicates if there is a hearing loop facility at the stop/platform

lift.description: Indicates if there is an elevator at the stop/platform

stairs.description: Indicates if there are stairs available in the stop

stop_accessible.description: Indicates if the stop is accessible

tactile_ground_surface_indicator.description: Indicates if there are tactile tiles (also known as tactile ground surface indicators, or TGSIs) at the stop

waiting_room.description: Indicates if there is a general waiting area at the stop

wheelchair.description: Facilities relating to the accessibility of the stop by wheelchair

latitude.description: Geographic coordinate of latitude at stop

longitude.description: Geographic coordinate of longitude at stop

parking.description: Indicates if there is at least one accessible parking spot at the stop that complies with the Disability Standards for Accessible Public Transport under the Disability Discrimination Act (1992)

telephone.description: Indicates if there is at least one accessible telephone at the stop/platform that complies with the Disability Standards for Accessible Public Transport under the Disability Discrimination Act (1992)

toilet.description: Indicates if there is at least one accessible toilet at the stop/platform that complies with the Disability Standards for Accessible Public Transport under the Disability Discrimination Act (1992)

low_ticket_counter.description: Indicates if there is at least one low ticket counter at the stop that complies with the Disability Standards for Accessible Public Transport under the Disability Discrimination Act (1992)

manouvering.description: Indicates if there is a space for mobility device to board on or off a transport mode

raised_platform.description: Indicates if there is a raised platform to board a train

ramp.description: Indicates if there are ramps (<1:14) at the stop/platform

secondary_path.description: Indicates if there is a path beyond the stop which is accessible

raised_platform_shelther.description: Indicates if there is shelter near the raised platform

steep_ramp.description: Indicates if there are ramps (>1:14) at the stop/platform

stops.description: Train stations, tram stops, bus stops, regional coach stops or Night Bus stops

disruptions.description: Disruption information applicable to relevant routes or stops

stop_latitude.description: Geographic coordinate of latitude at stop

stop_longitude.description: Geographic coordinate of longitude at stop

stop_sequence.description: Sequence of the stop on the route/run; return 0 when route_id or run_id not specified. Order ascendingly by this field (when non zero) to get physical order (earliest first) of stops on the route_id/run_id.

routes.description: List of routes travelling through the stop

stop_longitude.description: Geographic coordinate of longitude at stop
